hooks.name: Spooky Theme Validator
hooks.description: Reminds to use spooky theme colors when editing CSS files

action.message: CSS file saved! Remember to use the spooky theme variables (--spooky-black, --haunted-purple, --ghost-green, --pumpkin-orange) for consistency with the Halloween theme. Check if any hardcoded colors should use CSS custom properties instead.

hooks.name: Game Code Quality Check
hooks.description: Reviews game JavaScript for performance and best practices

action.message: Game code updated! Quick checks: 1) Are event listeners properly cleaned up? 2) Is requestAnimationFrame used for animations? 3) Are Socket.IO events validated? 4) Any memory leaks from object creation in loops?

hooks.name: Accessibility Check
hooks.description: Reminds about accessibility when HTML is modified

action.message: HTML updated! Accessibility checklist: Are ARIA labels present for interactive elements? Is keyboard navigation supported? Do images have alt text? Is color contrast sufficient for the spooky theme?

hooks.name: Run Tests on Save
hooks.description: Runs tests when test files are saved

hooks.name: Server Restart Reminder
hooks.description: Reminds to restart server when server code changes

action.message: Server code changed! Remember to restart the server with 'npm start' to apply changes.
